replies.body: Opinions?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions?

replies.body:
I haven't scrim anyone in a while since im kinda inactive, but still i used to be a bit nervous cuz you guys are a strong team that can handle mid pretty well.

7/10 didn't fought you that much, and there is not too many tips that i can give since avicus and potpvp are way different gameplays, plus it depends in your ping and how you click, im already used to fight like that because i've been playing for 6 years already and ik wat i can do and wat not xD

Thats a hard one, Chocolate

No LOLOLOL

I never rlly thought on becoming a ctw/dtm player, i just played for a month or two OCN cuz i was more of an HCF/Pot PvP guy, but i left HCF and quit minecraft for a bit and when i came back those servers didnt existed anymore and the only server that i could remembered was avicus, that i used to play with some rlllllllllllllly old friends, so i came in, joined ts and ya i met jiloker he invited me to his team and bla bla bla I stayed here cuz i know that its a way different server than others, the community its less toxic and everyone its rlly chill ( except for some ppl ), and everything its so different from HCF and those type of servers xD i can do strats and do what ever i want to, but in HCF you can't cuz u die and you dont want to wait 3 hours for the death ban xdlOLOLOL
replies.body_tagged:
I haven't scrim anyone in a while since im kinda inactive, but still i used to be a bit nervous cuz you guys are a strong team that can handle mid pretty well.

7/10 didn't fought you that much, and there is not too many tips that i can give since avicus and potpvp are way different gameplays, plus it depends in your ping and how you click, im already used to fight like that because i've been playing for 6 years already and ik wat i can do and wat not xD

Thats a hard one, Chocolate

No LOLOLOL

I never rlly thought on becoming a ctw/dtm player, i just played for a month or two OCN cuz i was more of an HCF/Pot PvP guy, but i left HCF and quit minecraft for a bit and when i came back those servers didnt existed anymore and the only server that i could remembered was avicus, that i used to play with some rlllllllllllllly old friends, so i came in, joined ts and ya i met jiloker he invited me to his team and bla bla bla I stayed here cuz i know that its a way different server than others, the community its less toxic and everyone its rlly chill ( except for some ppl ), and everything its so different from HCF and those type of servers xD i can do strats and do what ever i want to, but in HCF you can't cuz u die and you dont want to wait 3 hours for the death ban xdlOLOLOL
